entry.title: 2015/04/30 Diary of an Android programmer
entry.content:
30-Apr-2015

Yesterday, I started learning Android programming from scatch after a long thought. Why a long thought? To make a long story short, I have NOT coded any thing for the last 3 years, now I decided to coding and making some interesting stuffs by my own.

It seems to be not easy as it looks because technology & new android version is changing/releasing in a shorter period of time, and catching up with that requires greate effort & time, but on the other hand, I am stucking in current boring job (which I really don’t see my passion in it).

Time to change. I suppose. Even if I am out of date, it is time to catch up with new tech & fun, time to see & meet more friend. I need to be a stronger personality, now, no more delay to any specific time in the future anymore. Current job does not feed my soul, my curiousity or my passion.

Time to change, time to chase my dream

OK, just start, with some questions still I have no answer below:

  1. Why Android studio(IDE) says that ActionBarActivity is deprecated ?

Answer:

….Coming soon…

Cheers,

nobita-isc

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog, hope you will have a lot of fun here !

Let’s get started by introducing myself…

My name is Vu Xuan Duong, from Vietnam. Currently I am working as a software developer for a software company in Vietnam. I was studying in Japan for 2 years, so I can speak Japanese pretty well. I dont mind if you leave a comment in English, Japanese or Vietnamese.

Currently I want to learn Visual C++ for programming in Windows Enviroment due to job requirement. I am C related language lover but also concern in web programming (both server and client side). I was taking advance in researching about Internet Security in my university. Therefore, it would be glad to see/ share something about security issues in my blog.

Have fun !

nobita-isc

May 12, 2013
